entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Kentville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:26 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 04:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023
Temperature: -1.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -2.4°C
Wind: NE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or snow ending this morning then cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning this evening and ending before morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
